      • copyIO

        public static void copyIO(InputStream in,
                          OutputStream out,
                          int bufferSize)
                   throws IOException
        Convenience method for copying from an InputStream to an OutputStream. This method will attempt to copy until the read method on the InputStream returns -1.
        Parameters:
        in - the input stream to read from
        out - the output stream to write to
        bufferSize - the size of the buffer to use while copying
        Throws:
        IOException - in case an error occurs while reading or writing data
